pkgmetadata.longdescription: Flexible Univariate Count Models Based on Renewal Processes // Flexible univariate count models based on renewal processes. The models may include covariates and can be specified with familiar formula syntax as in glm() and package 'flexsurv'. The methodology is described by Kharrat et all (2019) doi:10.18637/jss.v090.i13 (included as vignette 'Countr_guide' in the package).
